item.description:
**Rescheduling this since several people have said the previous date didn't work. Hope more of you can come now! Please RSVP either way.**

Who doesn't know Camelot? Charming King Arthur marries beautiful Guenevere. They live in a perfect world where it only rains after dark. Then she cheats on him with his best friend. Hearts break. And we all get to hear beautiful ballads.

Meetup details: Tickets are $51 + outrageous handling fees (online purchase, Amazon payments) = $57.50. I will buy our seats together. When you RSVP, please just pay online through Amazon payments. **We can get a group discount if 10 people sign up, and if so, I will refund the difference to you.** Don't wait -- there are still seats left, but I'm sure they will sell out. The deadline to RSVP is 5 pm, Tuesday, Sept. 7. If you miss the deadline, but still want to go, send me an email.

The show starts at 7:30 pm, and we will meet in the lobby of Trinity Repertory Theatre at 7 p.m. Parking downtown can be tricky, so please allow plenty of time so you're not late. (This is Trinity Rep speaking, not just me!) There is a paid garage next to Trinity with entrances on both Fountain and Washington Streets.

After the show, we will head around the corner to Trinity Brewhouse for dinner/drinks/apps.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby at 7 pm - look for small red & white Meetup sign
item.name: Camelot - Trinity Rep
